question.questionText: Pam and her family were planning a hike. Pam found 2 maps of the same area. Her friend recommended she use the topographic map when they went to the lake. Which letter (Q, R, or S) on the map is on the steepest part of the trail? (Q) How do you know it is the steepest part of the trail?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The contour lines are closest together at Q.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: I know because the contour lines are smaller.
I Think this because for Q the mountains steepness 5000 and Q is very close.
The contour lines are closer together.
I know this by on the Q side the lines are closer together so they are steeper.
